TrainSimulator

Class TrackController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window

            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • TrainSimulator.TrackController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class TrackController
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This class will implement a track controller for a given set of blocks on a track.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • _SafetyTrackSpeed

        public SafetyTrackSpeed _SafetyTrackSpeed

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrackController

        public TrackController(int identityNum,
                       int firstBlock,
                       int endBlock,
                       TrackModel theLine,
                       PhantomCTCGUI ctc)
        This Constructor creates a TrackController object that can modify the Switches, Crossing Lights, and Railway Crossings of a track.

        This constructor creates a WaySide Controller as well as all of its necessary safety objects. The PLC Program (ValidateBooleanLogic) is also loaded and instantiated with its logic here.

        Parameters:
        identityNum - A number Identifying this Wayside Controller Object
        firstBlock - The First Block Location this Controller Monitors
        endBlock - The Last Block Location this Controller Monitors
        theLine - The Track this Wayside Controller is on
        ctc - The CTC Monitoring the whole Train Simulation System

    • Method Detail

      • getTrackStatus

        public TrackStatus getTrackStatus()
        This method returns this Controller's TrackStatus Object. This is object allows the CTC to get the track status for this track controller.
        Returns:
        Returns a this Controller's Track Status Object

      • setTrackControllerIdentifier

        public void setTrackControllerIdentifier(int identity)
        This method sets the identity of this WaySide Controller Object
        Parameters:
        identity - A number Identifying this Wayside Controller Object

      • getTrackControllerIdentifier

        public int getTrackControllerIdentifier()
        This method return the identity of this WaySide Controller Object
        Returns:
        A number Identifying this Wayside Controller Object

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed(int trainID,
                       int block_ID)
        This method returns the desired Train Speed from CTC
        Parameters:
        trainID - The Id of the Train
        block_ID - The Id of the Block
        Returns:
        The Speed the CTC wants this train to run at

      • getAuthority

        public double getAuthority(int trainID)
        This method returns the desired Train Authority from CTC
        Parameters:
        trainID - The Id of the Train
        Returns:
        The Authority the CTC wants this train travel

        public RailwayCrossing getRailwayCrossing()

        Returns:
        The Controller Associated with this Controller

      • dropCrossBar

        public boolean dropCrossBar(int crossingBlock_ID,
                            TrackModel theLine)
        This method decides whether we need to drop the Railway Crossing Bar.
        Parameters:
        crossingBlock_ID - The Id of the Block the Crossing is located on
        theLine - the Line this Controller and the Crossing is on
        Returns:
        Whether the Railway Crossing Bar was Dropped

      • raiseCrossBar

        public boolean raiseCrossBar(int crossingBlock_ID,
                             TrackModel theLine)
        This method decides whether we need to raise the Railway Crossing Bar.
        Parameters:
        crossingBlock_ID - The Id of the Block the Crossing is located on
        theLine - the Line this Controller and the Crossing is on
        Returns:
        Whether the Railway Crossing Bar was Raised

      • trackChange

        public boolean trackChange(TrackModel theLine,
                           int block_ID,
                           int openOrClose)
        This method decides whether we can perform a Track Switch Change and implements it if we can.
        Parameters:
        theLine - the Line this Controller and the Crossing is on
        block_ID - The Id of the Block the Switch is located on
        openOrClose - The State we want the Switch in. 1 for Open, 0 for Closed
        Returns:
        Whether the Track Switch Change was completed

      • passOrDeny

        public boolean passOrDeny()
        This method returns whether the CTC Command was Acknowledged.
        Returns:
        Whether the CTC Command was Acknowledged

      • getDt

        public double getDt()
        This method returns the period of the clock signal the system is running on.
        Returns:
        The period of the clock signal the system is running on
